sentences.english: The Tunisian economic miracle was an illusion, they claimed.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣称，突尼斯的经济奇迹只是一种幻象。

sentences.english: When you play Phantasmagorian, any player may discard three cards. If a player does, counter Phantasmagorian.
sentences.chinese: 当你使用惊怖幻象时，任意玩家可以弃三张牌。

sentences.english: Each vision reminded me that I was probably going to die.
sentences.chinese: 每个幻象使我想起，我可能要魂归地府了。

sentences.english: The moonwalk is a kind of an illusion and takes alot of practice.
sentences.chinese: 太空步是一种视觉幻象效果，需要多加练习。

sentences.english: None of these visions ever quite deluded him.
sentences.chinese: 这些幻象从来没有一个令他产生过什么错觉。

sentences.english: The movie has a keen, bitter sense of the sudden breakdown of preposterous illusions.
sentences.chinese: 电影犀利尖刻地反映了那些荒谬幻象的瞬间崩溃。

sentences.english: The deathlike inactivity of the winter earth is only an illusion.
sentences.chinese: 冬天大地里这种死一般的静止仅仅是一种幻象。

sentences.english: The physical system in duality is a purposeful illusion.
sentences.chinese: 二元性中的物质系统是一个有着特定目的的幻象。

sentences.english: The real difficulties and suffering bring the aesthetic mirage of distant era.
sentences.chinese: 现实的困难与不幸给我们带来了悠远时代的审美幻象。

sentences.english: A felicitous rhetoric mirage of advertisement language can enhance the salesmanship effect.
sentences.chinese: 恰当的广告语修辞幻象能够巧妙地增强广告的推销力。

sentences.english: Phantom rows can appear with this isolation level.
sentences.chinese: 幻象行会在该隔离级出现。

sentences.english: But that illusion is likely to be dispelled well before the new year.
sentences.chinese: 但这种幻象很可能在新年到来之前消散。

sentences.english: Spring dream became the direct map of this kind of idolum .
sentences.chinese: 春梦就成了这种幻象的直接映射。

sentences.english: Then there are no more hooks for illusion to attach to.
sentences.chinese: 之后，幻象就再也进不来了。

sentences.english: IT HAS BEEN a most disillusioning spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 这可说是最令人幻象破灭的景象。

sentences.english: The vision had been eclipsed, now it reappeared.
sentences.chinese: 原已破灭了的幻象现在竟又出现在眼前。

definition: to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
